description:
With the letter from Takasugi proving to be a catalyst, the Joi rebel gang starts to remember Kurokono, and takes a trip down memory line to the Joi War era. After a gruelling battle with the Bakufu army, Gin-san and his comrades were taking a momentary rest at an abandoned temple. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Reunion Also Brings to the Surface Things You Don`t Want to Remember
Dousoukai wa Omoidashitakunai Omoide mo Yomigaette Kuru
Pendant une réunion d’anciens élèves, on se souvient aussi de choses qu’on préférerait oublier
同窓会は思い出したくない思い出も蘇ってくる
